Articles.Content:
I'm starting a youtube channel and i'm kinda stuck. anyone who knows how to start  a yt channel can you guys please lowkey help me lmao.

youtube channel in my signature!

also is there any other ksp youtubers out there in the forums? it would be nice if you can share your experience with me and everyone else

Reach is important, if you share your videos in appropriate subreddits etc, you'll do well.

I made a funny Yogscast video and shared it on their subreddit, and I got 1,500 views from it. Upload regularly so people feel some need to subscribe so they don't miss a video, also an attractive profile picture, banner and thumbnails make your channel look extra nice.
